name: Real Deal
description:
Real Deal

Serve as well as possible hot goods to existing and new customers on the streets of New York and make a name for yourself. But always be alert, the police are on your trail!

A simple retro game with stealth characteristics and drug dealing as the main goal.
Themes: dangerous choices, retro game

We made all the assets ourselves and we spend 9h on the whole creation process of this game. The main concept was roughly developed in 3h afterward we've added animations, transitions, and 'juice' to make the game look and feel better.

Controls 
WASD - move
Space - deal/cancel
